Virgo Framework Creating App

Use virgo CLI to scaffold an application

                    
# terminal

py virgo.py lightstart <app_name>

Application Folder Structure

                    
apps/
├── app_name/
│   ├── static/
│   └── templates/
│   └── models.py
│   └── routes.py

Import app's Route

                    
# virgo.py

import apps.<app_name>.routes
